channel.title: Bes on Marshall Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Bes on Marshall Lab

item.title: Dynamic Biofilm Surveillance with Bioelectrochemical Systems
item.description: I use bioelectrochemical systems (electrodes) to monitor electron transfer reactions in biofilms. These systems allow for the real-time study of disturbance challenges, diffusion limitations, and metabolic turnover of the microbial population or community
